name: March Dribbble Meetup
description: Sessions Xiaodan is sharing a case study of millennium hotel where the design was well received by the clients and users. The talk will cover rapid design, prototyping and research example. James is sharing a short talk on content-driven– and continuous design. Or, How I Learned to Love Uncertainty & Stop Designing Everything Upfront. Some case studies from the trenches.
location: ThoughtWorks Pte. Ltd. 87B Amoy Street, Level 3 Singapore 069906

name: Battlehack
description: Sessions Xiaodan is sharing a case study of millennium hotel where the design was well received by the clients and users. name: Open, Crowdsource and Blockchain Science!
description: How can open data, open access, open hardware and trends in social networks, crowdsourcing, crowdfunding, alternative metrics and alternative currencies improve science? We want to bring different stakeholders interested in research, innovation, design, advocates of open science, citizen science, geeks, hackers, makers, and all people probing the new terrain of technological trends to discuss the future of science and rethink ways we can involve the public & Global South. Let's rethink how we can support open science in different parts of Asia? What are the limits and possibilities of these new approaches?
location: Show Map OneMaker Group - OMG National Design Centre, 111 Middle Road, #01 - 02, Singapore
